name: metadata
description: The metadata table contains a record of the changes that have been made to the data in order to maintain provenance information.

id.name: id
id.description: Each entry must have a unique identifier

resource_id.name: resource_id
resource_id.description: Each service, program. location, address, or contact will have a unique identifier.

resource_type.name: resource_type
resource_type.description: The type of entity being referenced

last_action_date.name: last_action_date
last_action_date.description: The date when data was changed.

last_action_type.name: last_action_type
last_action_type.description: The kind of change made to the data; eg create, update, delete

field_name.name: field_name
field_name.description: The name of field that has been modified

previous_value.name: previous_value
previous_value.description: The previous value of a field that has been updated

replacement_value.name: replacement_value
replacement_value.description: The new value of a field that has been updated

updated_by.name: updated_by
updated_by.description: The name of the person who updated a value
